content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. A mix of nature sounds and instrumental music is a great choice for creating a peaceful and calming atmosphere. It will help your sister relax and unwind, and it will complement the spa day experience perfectly.

Remember to keep the volume low and gentle, so it's not overpowering or distracting. You want the music to be a subtle accompaniment to the spa day, not the main focus.

I hope your sister enjoys the spa day and that it helps her feel relaxed and rejuvenated. It's great that you're taking the time to plan a special day for her, and I'm sure she'll appreciate the thought and effort you're putting into it.

If you have any other questions or need any more suggestions, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope everything goes smoothly and that your sister has a wonderful time.
